page.title: 10NEW HOUSING
page.content:
A 650 house estate is presently (1985) under construction in the area between Upper Eastern Green Lane and the A45, immediately adjacent to the 'green belt' between Coventry and Birmingham. The estate is being constructed by three building firms; Bovis, Bryant and Benfield - the last of these also being responsible for the development of a shopping complex on the site.
The Bovis homes are typical of the houses being built, their part of the new estate being called Woodridge. It is incidentally the 100th aniversary of the foundation of the firm this year.
There are 223 houses on the Woodridge estate. There are 10 types of houses varying in price between Â£40 000 and Â£60 000. They are called the Stratford
